login.note: Want to get started with MooseDesk? Create a {free_account} here.

login.notify_reset_one: We have sent the instructions to your email address.
login.notify_reset_two: Please follow the instructions in order to reset your password.

people.create_account_question: Want to get started with MooseDesk? Create a free account here.

work_desk.name: Name

account_security.allow_with_email: Allow users with email addresses from an approved email domain to use the sign up link.
account_security.otp_required: Please enter the 6 digits OTP code that we send to your email address in order to enable 2FA with your email.
account_security.off_note: You will login normally with your email and password without any additional verifycation steps. This method will have higher risks for any security breach.
account_security.use_email_note: When you login from a new computer or browser, system will send an OTP code to your email to verify your identity.
account_security.not_receive_yet: Did not receive the code yet?
account_security.download_tutorial: 1. Download and install any authenticator application in your mobile device (Google Authenticator, 2FAs, Duo Mobile,...etc)
account_security.open_auth: Open your authenticator and scan this QR code.
account_security.enter_otp_auth: Enter the OTP generated by the authenticator application.

multiple.delete_title: Are you sure that you want to permanently remove these tickets?
multiple.delete_content: These tickets will be remove permanently. This action cannot be undone.
